column4: anyone here who owns a hp pavilion dv9000 series and has a working! bootline to bypass the buggy bios?

i've tried most combinations (acpi=off noapic nolapic pnpbios=off biosirq irqpoll,...). nothing works. problem is bad irq7. when the problem occurs, i have to unload the ehci_hcd module and reload it to get usb working (at 1.1 speed only, though)
i can't boot with acpi=off alone. the system hangs at "assume root bridge"
